mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat_request (chat_id, inviter_account, receiver_account, status, invite_time) VALUES (#{chatId}, #{inviterAccount}, #{receiverAccount}, #{status}, #{inviteTime})
mapper.update: UPDATE chat_request SET status = #{status} WHERE chat_id = #{chatId}
